Name: Chumbi Valley
Description: Chumbi Valley is a role-playing blockchain game. It is being built on BSC & Polygon for its near-instant transaction speed and almost zero fees. The game will be playable in app form, launching on PC, Mac, Android, and eventually iOS. All in-game items and creatures are blockchain-based tokens and NFTs.
